title: dhEva banda
sahitya:
,,,dEva banda namma | 



swaami bandanO ||



,,,dEvara dEva shi- | 



kaamaNi banda- || 



nO, dEva banda namma | 



swaamee ... ||







anupallavi







,,uraga shayana banda | 



,,garuda gamana banda ||



,,nara golidava banda |



naaraayaNa ban- ||



da (dEva) ||







CaraNam







,,,pakshivaahana banda |



lakshmi ramaNa banda ||



,,,akshaya phala- |



da lakshmaNaagraja banda ||



,,nigama kOsara banda |



,,nitya truptanu banda ||



,,nagemukha purandara |



viThala banda- || 



nO (dEva) ||
